HouseClass *  buildingOwner

Parameters:
theBuilding the building which we're trying to link to existing buildings.
selectedCell the cell at which we're trying to build.
buildingOwner the owner of the building we're trying to link.

00307         int maxLinkDistance = theBuilding->Type->GuardRange / 256; // GuardRange governs how far the link can go, is saved in leptons
00308 
00309         for(int direction = 0; direction <= 7; direction += 2) { // the 4 straight directions of the simple compass
00310                 CellStruct directionOffset = CellSpread::GetNeighbourOffset(direction); // coordinates of the neighboring cell in the given direction relative to the current cell (e.g. 0,1)
00311                 int linkLength = 0; // how many cells to build on from center in direction to link up with a found building
00312 
00313                 for(int distanceFromCenter = 1; distanceFromCenter <= maxLinkDistance; ++distanceFromCenter) {
00314                         CellStruct cellToCheck = selectedCell;
00315                         cellToCheck.X += short(distanceFromCenter * directionOffset.X); // adjust the cell to check based on current distance, relative to the selected cell
00316                         cellToCheck.Y += short(distanceFromCenter * directionOffset.Y); // e.g. 25 += 5 * 1 for "five away on the Y axis"
00317 
00318                         if(!MapClass::Global()->CellExists(&cellToCheck)) { // don't parse this cell if it doesn't exist (duh)
00319                                 break;
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         CellClass *cell = MapClass::Global()->GetCellAt(&cellToCheck);
00323 
00324                         if(BuildingClass *OtherEnd = cell->GetBuilding()) { // if we find a building...
00325                                 if(buildingExtData->canLinkTo(OtherEnd)) { // ...and it is linkable, we found what we needed
00326                                         linkLength = distanceFromCenter - 1; // distanceFromCenter directly would be on top of the found building
00327                                         break;
00328                                 }
00329 
00330                                 break; // we found a building, but it's not linkable
00331                         }
00332 
00333                         if(!cell->CanThisExistHere(theBuilding->Type->SpeedType, theBuilding->Type, buildingOwner)) { // abort if that buildingtype is not allowed to be built there
00334                                 break;
00335                         }
00336 
00337                 }
00338 
00339                 ++Unsorted::SomeMutex; // another mystical Westwood mechanism. According to D, Bad Things happen if this is missing.
00340                 for(int distanceFromCenter = linkLength; distanceFromCenter > 0; --distanceFromCenter) { // build a line of this buildingtype from the found building (if any)
00341                         CellStruct cellToBuildOn = selectedCell;                                                                                        // to the newly built one
00342                         cellToBuildOn.X += short(distanceFromCenter * directionOffset.X);
00343                         cellToBuildOn.Y += short(distanceFromCenter * directionOffset.Y);
00344 
00345                         if(CellClass *cell = MapClass::Global()->GetCellAt(&cellToBuildOn)) {
00346                                 if(BuildingClass *tempBuilding = specific_cast<BuildingClass *>(theBuilding->Type->CreateObject(buildingOwner))) {
00347                                         CoordStruct coordBuffer;

00349                                         if(!tempBuilding->Put(&coordBuffer, 0)) {
00350                                                 delete tempBuilding;
00351                                         }

DWORD BuildingExt::GetFirewallFlags ( BuildingClass *  pThis  )  [static] 

00072                                                         {
00073         CellClass *MyCell = MapClass::Global()->GetCellAt(pThis->get_Location());
00074         DWORD flags = 0;
00075         for(int direction = 0; direction < 8; direction += 2) {
00076                 CellClass *Neighbour = MyCell->GetNeighbourCell(direction);
00077                 if(BuildingClass *B = Neighbour->GetBuilding()) {
00078                         BuildingTypeExt::ExtData* pTypeData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(B->Type);
00079                         if(pTypeData->Firewall_Is && B->Owner == pThis->Owner && !B->InLimbo && B->IsAlive) {
00080                                 flags |= 1 << (direction >> 1);
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083         }
00084         return flags;
00085 }
